tool_description: Monitors DNS record propagation across global nameservers and provides detailed propagation status reports.

domain_name.description: Domain name to check propagation for

record_types.description: DNS record types to check (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS)

nameservers.description: Specific nameservers to query (default uses global set)

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain must be a valid fully qualified domain name.
Unsupported record type: Use supported record types A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS.
Nameserver unreachable: One or more specified nameservers are not responding.
Query timeout: DNS queries timed out, check network connectivity.
usage: Provide domain name and record types to check. Optionally specify custom nameservers to query. Returns propagation status across multiple DNS servers worldwide.

consistent_responses.description: Number of servers returning expected values

estimated_completion.description: Estimated full propagation time in ISO format
